title: Guns and gold win in 2025, but other 'safety' trades bomb
description: Precious metals were the clear winner in 2025, while pretty much all other traditional "safe haven" investments underperformed. That's remarkable in a year marked by turbulence, conflict, and rumbling artificial intelligence bubble fears.

title: Greek Cabinet to Meet Under Mitsotakis as Government Pushes Anti
description: Greece’s Cabinet will meet at 11 a.m. Tuesday under Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis, with a wide-ranging agenda that includes a national anti-corruption digital registry, sweeping reforms to wildfire management and new rules on the use of artificial intelligence across government.

title: HCLSoftware to acquire business intelligence platform Jaspersoft for $240 million
description: HCLSoftware is set to acquire Jaspersoft for a hefty sum of $240 million. With this acquisition, HCLSoftware will welcome 115 new team members into its fold. This expansion aims to significantly strengthen HCLSoftware's offerings in data and artificial intelligence.
